lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.question: What power did the evil spirit give the slave girl?
answers: To tell people secrets about their lives and the future

questions.question: Why did Paul order the spirit to leave in Jesus’ name?
answers: Because the girl asked him to

questions.question: Why were the slave girl’s owners angry?
answers: Without the spirit’s power, the slave girl couldn’t make them money
The slave girl ran away from home
The slave girl refused to work
Paul and Silas didn't ask permission

questions.question: What punishment did the leaders in Philippi give Paul and Silas?
answers: They were beaten and thrown in prison
They were sent back to Jerusalem

questions.question: What did Paul and Silas do while in prison?
answers: They promised to stop talking about Jesus

questions.question: What happened around midnight?
answers: An earthquake shook the jail, opened the doors, and loosened the chains

questions.question: What question did the jailer ask Paul and Silas?
answers: What must I do to be saved?

questions.question: What was Paul’s answer to the jailer?
answers: Believe in the Lord Jesus, and you will be saved
Follow God's laws, and you will be saved
Give money to the poor, and you will be saved

questions.question: How did the jailer care for Paul and Silas?
answers: He washed their wounds and fed them at his home
He gave them a better prison cell

questions.question: Who did Paul and Silas baptize?
answers: The jailer and his whole family
